author: Ellen Ormesher
description:
British national newspapers devoted more than triple the space to advertising polluting industries such as oil, airlines, and sports utility vehicles than they did to covering last year’s United Nations climate talks, according to a new study. Total high-carbon advertising — including for fossil fuel companies, cruises, and banks financing oil and gas – amounted to […]

The post UK Newspapers Publish More Ads for Polluting Products Than Climate Coverage  appeared first on DeSmog.
title: UK Newspapers Publish More Ads for Polluting Products Than Climate Coverage
